nerves.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to talk about someone being worried or frightened
nerves.translation[0].definitions[0].not: somebody’s nerves are on edge/in tatters/frayed (=someone feels very worried or frightened)
nerves.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Sean drank a large glass of brandy to calm his nerves.
I remember you were a bundle of nerves on your wedding day.
nerves.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the feeling of being worried or a little frightened
nerves.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: A lot of people suffer from nerves before they go on stage.
‘What’s wrong with Rachel?’ ‘It’s just nerves. She’s got her driving test tomorrow.’
